title: Marketplace Roundtable #28: Commodity Picks Across The Board With Andrew Hecht
description: Today's Marketplace Roundtable podcast features Andrew Hecht, author of the weekly Hecht Commodity Report. Hecht's investment strategy focuses on fundamentals. He looks at supply and demand to get a view of direction bias, then at technical indicators for entry and exit points as pricing cycles tend to determine tops and bottoms in the commodities sector. His aim with the service is to provide the most comprehensive, deep-dive commodities report on the market.
itunes:title: Commodity Picks Across The Board With Andrew Hecht
itunes:author: Seeking Alpha
itunes:subtitle: A commodities trader with decades of experience shares his strategy and current picks in the wide-ranging sector.
